item.description:
Who would like to attend a free aura event and chakra meditation either in July or August when the group is not having a regular meeting?

Let me know so I can put out a date that the most people would be able to attend for this.

I wish I could get to more events but it always seems I am working or have something going on during them - so lets get together this summer!

Namaste
Keith
item.name: Free Aura Event
